page.title: 13Housing
page.content: On the west side of Tisbury most of the houses are made from brick. There is an old peoples home at Nadder Close where the old people live in bungalows. On Monmouth Hill some new houses are being built by Persimmon Homes. These are mainly of brick. There are some bungalows also. Most of the properties on this estate are detached. At the top of Churchill Estate the houses are covered in pebble dash, at the bottom of this council estate the houses are of brown brick. The vast majority of the housing in our area is situated in Tisbury and most are very old. Most of the houses outside of Tisbury are farm houses or cottages. Walking around our area houses of almost every kind and built of every material can be found.
